Description: IxLoad on AWS 2-VMone 2-VPC Peering Test CloudFormation

UserEmailTag.Description: Email address tag of user creating the stack

UserLoginTag.Description: Login ID tag of user creating the stack

IxClientInstanceType.Description: Instance type of Ixia Client VM

IxClientSSH.Description: Name of an existing EC2 Pair to enable SSH access

VMoneInstanceType.Description: Instance type of VMONE Appliance VM

InboundIPv4CidrBlock.ConstraintDescription: must be a valid IP CIDR range of the form x.x.x.x/x.
InboundIPv4CidrBlock.Description: IP Address /32 or IP CIDR range connecting inbound to Ixia Client
